mapper.select: select user_2022.agree_to_the_agreement, user_2022.uid, user_info_2022.`name`, user_info_2022.age, user_info_2022.sex, user_info_2022.email, user_info_2022.phone, user_info_2022.address, user_info_2022.avatar_url, user_info_2022.introduction, user_info_2022.company, user_info_2022.profession, user_info_2022.website from user_2022 left join user_info_2022 on user_info_2022.uid = user_2022.uid where user_2022.uid = #{uid}
select media_file_url, media_file_companion_url, media_type, media_description, x_18_content from user_screen_media_file_url_2022 where screen_id = #{screen_id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_screen_2022 ( screen_id, screen_content, uid, associate_topics, associate_users, is_public, system_review_result, post_time, create_time) values ( #{screenId}, #{screenContent}, #{uid}, #{associateTopics}, #{associateUsers}, #{isPublic}, #{systemReviewResult}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp() );
mapper.select: SELECT screen_id, screen_content, uid, like_times, dislike_times, associate_topics, associate_users, post_time, edit_time, edit_times, is_public, system_review_result FROM user_screen_2022 WHERE screen_id = #{screenId}

SELECT screen_id, screen_content, uid, like_times, dislike_times, associate_topics, associate_users, post_time, edit_time, edit_times, is_public, system_review_result FROM user_screen_2022 WHERE system_review_result=1 AND is_public=1 AND (screen_content like "%"#{keywords}"%" OR associate_topics like "%"#{keywords}"%" OR associate_users like "%"#{keywords}"%") LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
